abstract: Google believes it finally has found the formula to cash in on YouTube’s potential as a magnet for online video advertising and keep its audience loyal at the same time.
snippet: Google believes it finally has found the formula to cash in on YouTube’s potential as a magnet for online video advertising and keep its audience loyal at the same time.
lead_paragraph: Ever since Google bought YouTube last November, it has avoided cluttering the site and the video clips themselves with ads, for fear of alienating its audience.

headline.main: Google Aims to Make YouTube Profitable With Ads
headline.print_headline: Google Aims to Make YouTube Profitable With Ads

abstract: After turning millions of Internet users into virtual explorers of the world, the Internet search giant is now hoping to turn many of them into virtual stargazers.
snippet: After turning millions of Internet users into virtual explorers of the world, the Internet search giant is now hoping to turn many of them into virtual stargazers.
lead_paragraph: After turning millions of Internet users into virtual explorers of the world with Google Earth, the Internet search giant is now hoping to turn many of them into virtual stargazers.

headline.main: In Google Earth, a Service for Scanning the Heavens
headline.print_headline: In Google Earth, a Service For Scanning the Heavens

abstract: This is what people may be talking about today. It may even help you strike up a conversation with the cute girl in I.T., the one with the big G-Shock watch.
